major_ids.Twisting Threads: +Twisting Threads: Tangled Trap ropes are much stronger and max traps increase by 12, but trap and bomb effects are weakened.
major_ids.Fixate: +Fixate: All Winded effects are stronger, but Winded applies slowly
major_ids.Lifestream: +Lifestream: Increases Blood Sorrow's damage and overhealth, but shortens its duration by 75%.
major_ids.Insoluble: +Insoluble: Dissolution now lasts 2.5 seconds, but grants only 35% resistance.
major_ids.Efflorescence: +Efflorescence: Jasmine Bloom deals increased damage but has reduced vertical range
major_ids.Perfect Recall: +Perfect Recall: Memory Recollection adds 1 extra spell. Increases Chaos Explosion's mana bank requirement to 150.
major_ids.Furious Effigy: +Furious Effigy: Totem effects are twice as fast, but duration is halved
major_ids.Soul Eater: +Soul Eater: Devour and Harvester grant double mana. Decreases maximum marks by 1.
major_ids.Rally: +Rally: Charge heals you by 10% and nearby allies by 15% on impact, but becomes harmless
major_ids.Meteor Crash: +Meteor Crash: Burning Sigil deals more damage in a massively increased radius, but lasts half as long.
major_ids.Greed: +Greed: Picking up emeralds heals you and nearby players for 8% max health
major_ids.Strings of Fate: +Strings of Fate: Your puppets have a lifetime of 3 seconds, and deal double damage with attacks and explosions.
major_ids.Forest's Blessing: +Forest's Blessing: Your archer summons have increased movement speed, attack speed, and vision. Bomb Arrow's damage is reduced by  -30%
major_ids.Divine Honor: +Divine Honor: Increases the bonus from Radiance by 10%. Bash deals  -15% per hit.
major_ids.Dead Weight: +Dead Weight: Totem's horizontal velocity is greatly increased at the cost of vertical movement
major_ids.Transcendence: +Transcendence: 30% chance for spells to cost no mana when casted
major_ids.Freerunner: +Freerunner: When your sprint bar is under 30% full, increase your sprint speed by +150%
major_ids.Fission: +Fission: Explosions from your Exploding ID are twice as big and twice as strong
major_ids.Totemic Fuse: +Totemic Fuse: Totemic Smash doubles in radius and deals extra damage but Totem lasts half as long.
major_ids.Roving Assassin: +Roving Assassin: Vanish will no longer block mana and health regeneration
major_ids.Heart of the Pack: +Heart of the Pack: Nearby players gain 75% of the health you naturally regenerate
major_ids.Guardian: +Guardian: 35% of damage taken by nearby allies is redirected to you
major_ids.Geocentrism: +Geocentrism: Aura radiates from you instead of your Totem and can be cast any time
major_ids.Saviour’s Sacrifice: +Saviour’s Sacrifice: While under 50% maximum health, nearby allies gain 15% bonus damage and defence
major_ids.Sublimation: +Sublimation: Totemic Shatter heals 75% of Regeneration's usual amount, with reduced Totem area of effect
major_ids.Fallout: +Fallout: Bomb Arrow's blast becomes giant. Damage, self-damage, and recoil are severely increased
major_ids.Cherry Bombs: +Cherry Bombs: Turn Smoke Bomb into three firecrackers that fly farther, tighter, and deal high damage instantly
major_ids.Seeking Module: +Seeking Module: Homing Shots track towards nearby enemies much more aggressively.
major_ids.Entropy: +Entropy: Meteor falls three times faster
major_ids.Paragon: +Paragon: Shield Strike deals  300% damage. Mantle of the Bovemist's cooldown is significantly reduced, but is limited to one shield charge.
major_ids.Peaceful Effigy: +Peaceful Effigy: Your Totem will last twice as long
major_ids.Lustrate: +Lustrate: Heal restores health at a slower rate, but Stronger Sunshower deals  +80%  +40%  +10%
major_ids.Windsurf: +Windsurf: Righting Reflex lasts twice as long and is affected stronger by movement speed
major_ids.Hellfire: +Hellfire: Bash becomes one giant 250% damage hit, and Boiling Blood burns faster and stronger but can't slow
major_ids.Last Resort: +Last Resort: Bloodlust has doubled corrupted scaling and knockback, but deals  -50%  -30%
major_ids.Sorcery: +Sorcery: 30% chance for spells and attacks to cast a second time at no additional cost
major_ids.Lockdown: +Lockdown: Meteor will snap onto a target in range, regardless of aim.
major_ids.Frenetic Spirit: +Frenetic Spirit: Guardian Angels deal almost no damage, but shoots faster and expires much slower. Frenzy's cap is increased to 125%.
major_ids.Gravity Well: +Gravity Well: Meteor has increased blast radius and pulls enemies instead
major_ids.Juggle: +Juggle: Stronger Multihit adds an additional 12 hits. All hits are reduced by  -10%.
major_ids.Displace: +Displace: Wind Slash deals massive knockback to enemies hit by Teleport
major_ids.Tackle: +Tackle: Flying Kick deals much more knockback and Collide deals much more damage on impact.
major_ids.Plague: +Plague: Poisoned mobs spread their poison to nearby mobs
major_ids.Flurry of Blows: +Flurry of Blows: Turn Double Slice into a 10-hit pummeling of 16% damage per hit
major_ids.Perilous Flare: +Perilous Flare: Pyrokinesis moves much slower, but has an increased Area of Effect and  +50%
major_ids.Flashfreeze: +Flashfreeze: Ice Snake is instant and freezes for +1s
major_ids.Evershot: +Evershot: Arrow Hurricane becomes a consistent, straight stream of arrows with a slower fire rate, dealing greater knockback and double damage per arrow
major_ids.Hurricane's Eye: +Hurricane's Eye: Violent Vortex applies 2 marks to every enemy it hits.
major_ids.Gruesome Knots: +Gruesome Knots: Twisted Tether spends three times as much of your Blood Pool ⚕ to deal double damage
major_ids.Temblor: +Temblor: Bash gains +1 Area of Effect and is 25% faster
major_ids.Hawkeye: +Hawkeye: Condense Arrow Storm into a tight beam. Arrows deal  10%,  1%, and  1%
major_ids.Overwhelm: +Overwhelm: Bash will hit +2 times
major_ids.Napalm: +Napalm: Fire Creep increases Arrow Bomb damage and self-damage, but reduces velocity. Fire Creep damage and radius are increased.
major_ids.Pounce: +Pounce: Escape becomes a forward lunge.
major_ids.Gentle Glow: +Gentle Glow: Orphion's Pulse and Fluid Healing restore more health, especially to allies, but at a slower speed
major_ids.Magnet: +Magnet: Pulls items dropped by mobs towards you
major_ids.Expunge: +Expunge: When using Heal, cast one instant pulse that heals 20% of your max health
major_ids.Alter Ego: +Alter Ego: Awakened can be activated after saving 40% less mana, but its duration is reduced by 25%.
major_ids.Cavalryman: +Cavalryman: You may cast spells and attack with a -30% damage penalty while on a horse
major_ids.Reckless Abandon: +Reckless Abandon: Sacrifice War Scream's defense bonus to give Tempest two extra hits, extra damage, and extra speed
major_ids.Escape Route: +Escape Route: Frenzy and Time Dilation charge twice as fast, but to a halved maximum.
major_ids.Lightweight: +Lightweight: You no longer take fall damage
major_ids.Lunge: +Lunge: Hop and Leap's horizontal velocity is greatly increased
major_ids.Taunt: +Taunt: Mobs within 12 blocks target you upon casting War Scream
major_ids.Rock Shield: +Rock Shield: Arrow Shield's defense is increased by 10%, but its number of charges is reduced by 1.
major_ids.Mangle: +Mangle: Lacerate will deal +1 slash
major_ids.Rusted Ichor: +Rusted Ichor: Boiling Blood inflicts increased slowness with a shorter cooldown, but deals no damage
major_ids.Explosive Impact: +Explosive Impact: Your Exploding ID can trigger when hitting mobs with your Main Attack
major_ids.Snowy Steps: +Snowy Steps: Leaves a trail of snow behind you
major_ids.Festive Spirit: +Festive Spirit: Plays wintery tunes
major_ids.Find Thyself: +Find Thyself: Masquerade now grants 75 Mana after switching between Masks 3 times.
major_ids.Madness: +Madness: Casts a random spell of your class every 3 seconds
major_ids.Coagulate: +Coagulate: Blood Connection launches you further and higher upon teleporting to a nearby totem
major_ids.Power Fist: +Power Fist: Striking enemies with an empty hand greatly knocks them back
